question: 開く
sourceAnswer:
<read>ひらく</read>:: to:{open/undo/unseal/unpack} | to:{bloom/unfold/spread-out} | to:open-(for-business,-e.g.-in-the-morning) | to:{be-wide-(gap,-etc.)/widen} | to{}{hold-(meeting,-party,-etc.)/give/open} | to{}{found-(nation,-dynasty,-sect,-etc.)/open-(a-new-business)/set-up/establish/start} | to{}open-(ports,-borders,-etc.) | to{}open-(an-account) | to{}{open-up-(new-land,-path,-etc.)/clear/develop} | to{}open-(a-file,-etc.) | to{}{extract-(root)/reduce-(equation)} | to{}cut-open-(fish) | to{}change-(kanji-into-hiragana) | to:flare-(e.g.-skirt) | to:slacken-(into-a-poor-posture)
<read>あく</read>:: to:open-(e.g.-doors) | to:open-(e.g.-business,-etc.) | to-be:empty | to-be:{vacant/available/free} | to-be:open-(e.g.-neckline,-etc.) | to:have-been-opened-(of-one's-eyes,-mouth,-etc.) | to:come-to-an-end | to{}open-(one's-eyes,-mouth,-etc.) | to:{have-a-hole/form-a-gap/have-an-interval-(between-events)}
userAnswer:
<read>あく</read>: to:{} open/unseal/unpack
<read>ひらく</read>: to:{} open/unfold/spread-out/bloom
activeAnswer:
<read>あく</read>: to:{} open/unseal/unpack
<read>ひらく</read>: to:{} open/unfold/spread-out/bloom
sourceMnemonic: You should know <ja>開ける</ja> by now. This word is similar to that, except it has to do with when things are just open. It's the same thing, though. The meaning is also <vocabulary>to open</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Do you remember the reading for <ja>開ける</ja>, which you learned in level 10? That's right, it's <ja>あける</ja>! So if you know the reading of that word (I hope you do!) then you can apply that knowledge here.

Just a quick side note — <ja>開く</ja> can also be read as <ja>ひらく</ja>, but we're going to focus on the <ja>あく</ja> reading here. Since <ja>ひらく</ja> has slightly different meanings, we won't accept it as a reading for this word, so be sure to enter <ja>あく</ja>!
references: Cure Dolly: The Right Opening? あく、あける、ひらく、ひらける、 開く、開け
